oddsBet - Variable in class com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps.LineBet
The Odds Bet that is optionally attached to a Line Bet of any type
OddsBet - Class in com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps
An OddsBet is attached to any LineBet type and is (optionally) set after the point of the line bet is set.
OddsBet(String, int, int, int, int, Double) - Constructor for class com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps.OddsBet
Constructor for an Odds bet, which calls the super (Bet) constructor, then sets the Payout Ratio, winning and losing rolls.
